titleStmt.title: The image of God, or laie mans boke in which the right knowledge of God is disclosed, and diuerse doubtes besides the principal matter, made by Roger Hutchinson. 1550.
titleStmt.author: Hutchinson, Roger, d. 1555.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Iohn Day, dwelling ouer Aldersgate,
publicationStmt.date: Anno do. 1560. Cum gratia & priuilegio Reginæ maiestatis per septennium.

notesStmt.note: Variant: imprint dated "1160" (most copies corrected in pen).
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
